sources.text: Chet Faker - Love & Feeling (Live Sessions Acoustic Guitar Cover)
Love And Feeling - Chet Faker - Guitar Lesson

Lonely sun, enough of lies

E                 Bm

I know the way is getting hard

       C#m           B

E                       Bm

Now everything, it seems okay
